net.proteusframework.cms.controller.ckeditor

Interface FileInfo

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileInfoResult
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileInfoImpl

    public interface FileInfo
    File information for the CKEditor file manager. All properties are required unless otherwise documented.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Date getCreateTime()
      Get the date the file was created.
      String getFilename()
      Get the file name.
      Date getLastModTime()
      Get the date the file was modified.
      String getLastModUser()
      Get the user that modified the file.
      String getPath()
      Get the path of the file.
      String getPreviewImageURL()
      Get the preview image URL.
      Map<String,String> getProperties()
      Get additional properties.
      Long getSize()
      Get the size of the file.
      String getURL()
      Get the URL for the file / folder.
      boolean isDirectory()
      Check if the file represents a directory.

    • Method Detail

      • getCreateTime

        Date getCreateTime()
        Get the date the file was created.
        Returns:
        the date created.

      • getFilename

        String getFilename()
        Get the file name.
        Returns:
        the file name.

      • getLastModTime

        Date getLastModTime()
        Get the date the file was modified.
        Returns:
        the date modified.

      • getLastModUser

        String getLastModUser()
        Get the user that modified the file.
        Returns:
        the modification user. May be null.

      • getPath

        String getPath()
        Get the path of the file.
        Returns:
        the path.

      • getPreviewImageURL

        String getPreviewImageURL()
        Get the preview image URL.
        Returns:
        the preview image. Null if not supported.

      • getProperties

        Map<String,String> getProperties()
        Get additional properties. For example, for an image you may want to return the width and height / dimension properties. The properties are implementation dependent (e.g. CFC file manager). The default implementation FileInfoImpl will automatically add supported properties.
        Returns:
        additional properties. May be empty.
        See Also:
        FileInfoImpl.PROP_WIDTH, FileInfoImpl.PROP_HEIGHT

      • getSize

        Long getSize()
        Get the size of the file.
        Returns:
        the size. May be null if a directory.

      • getURL

        String getURL()
        Get the URL for the file / folder.
        Returns:
        the URL.

      • isDirectory

        boolean isDirectory()
        Check if the file represents a directory.
        Returns:
        true or false.
